name: mage-icons-react
description: Finely constructed icons, perfect for deployment in web, iOS, Android, and desktop environments. Features support for SVG and web font technologies. Completely open-source, governed by the Apache License 2.0.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && rm -rf stroke && rm -rf bulk && NODE_ENV=production babel src/ --out-dir ./ --copy-files && rm -rf src

author: Mage Icons (https://mageicons.com/)
